name: Kecleon
author: Toyste Beach
flavor_text: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.

abilities.name: Color Change
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, this Pokémon is the same type as the your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Imittack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon’s attacks. If this Pokémon has the necessary Energy to use that attack, use it as this attack.
